article_title: Duolingo ABC arrives as free interactive iOS app without ads to teach kids to read
article_description: Over the years  Duolingo has become one of the most popular ways to learn a new language  It shook up the market using a free model with gamification  no ads  and a focus on high frequency words to become conversational in a new language quickly  Now the comp
